main event: A UFO was observed by several witnesses in Walker Valley, New York on the evening of January 16, 1951.
interesting points: The object was described as bright and metallic in appearance., It moved rapidly in a straight line before making a 90 degree turn., Witnesses were unable to estimate the size or altitude of the object., No physical evidence was found at the site., The sighting occurred around 7:00 P.M. on a calm, silent night.
witness description: Civilian, including a salesgirl and housewife, her husband and three sons.
